name: Hojo Clan Daimyo Estate
description:
Increases Hojo Clan support providing bonuses to Barracks Infantry.  
Produces the Daimyo unit. Hojo Daimyo Estate health is increased +1000 and cost increased x2 Stone and Wood.

variations.descriptionCN:
增加北条氏支援，为兵营步兵提供加成。
生产大名单位。每建造一座北条氏大名府邸，其生命值 +1000，消耗的石料和木材 +x2。
influences: Barracks, Archery Ranges and Stables production speed increased +20% while within the influence of any Daimyo Estate.
influencesCN: 当处于任何大名府邸的影响范围内时，兵营、靶场和马厩的生产速度 +20%。
